compatibility.notes: The QPL-1.0 license allows for weak copyleft, meaning that it can be combined with other licenses, but care must be taken to comply with the terms of the QPL-1.0 when distributing combined works.

key_requirements: Distribute the entire package including copyright, trademark notices, and disclaimers.
Provide prominent notices explaining the availability of source code.
Ensure modifications are available under the same license.
license.name: QPL-1.0-INRIA-2004
obligations: Include the license document in all distributions.
Ensure that all recipients can access the complete machine-readable source code.
Do not alter or remove any copyright notices in the Software.
Grant a non-exclusive royalty-free right to the initial developer for future distribution of modifications.
